text: Ewan jinen, ku idi runistine (wusa pir bune ji kirasan hatine birine) idi kevinbuna wan naye gomankirine hene! Heke ji bona xwe diyarkirine xemil nisandin nebe, dikarin, ku xemla xweye kincan derxin. Le disa heke xwe biparisinin, ji bona wan ra parisandin cetir e. Loma bi rasti Yezdan pir bihistek u pirzan e
